TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ServiceAccount extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定服务的安全上下文，安全上下文定义其登录类型。

span.span: Specifies a service's security context, which defines its logon type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化时使用枚举 来指定正在安装的服务的安全上下文。Use the enumeration when you initialize a to specify the security context of the service you are installing. 安全上下文指示服务在系统上的权限，以及服务在网络上的作用 (例如，服务是否向远程服务器提供计算机的凭据或匿名凭据) 。The security context indicates the privileges a service has on the system and how the services act on the network (for example, whether the service presents the computer's credentials or anonymous credentials to remote servers). 枚举提供了一系列权限，以便您可以指定任何特定服务所需的完全权限。The enumeration provides a range of privileges so that you can specify exactly the privileges you need for any particular service. `LocalSystem`值定义了一个具有高特权的帐户，但大多数服务不需要此类提升的权限级别。The `LocalSystem` value defines a highly privileged account, but most services do not require such an elevated privilege level. `LocalService`和 `NetworkService` 枚举成员为安全上下文提供较低的权限级别。The `LocalService` and `NetworkService` enumeration members provide a lower privilege level for the security context. > [!NOTE] > 值 `LocalService` 和 `NetworkService` 仅适用于 windows XP 和 windows Server 2003 家族。The values `LocalService` and `NetworkService` are available only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 family. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过 使用系统帐户的安全上下文，使用枚举来安装新的程序。The following code example demonstrates how to use the enumeration to install new programs by using the system account's security context. [!code-cpp[Classic ServiceInstaller Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ServiceInstaller Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ServiceInstaller Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ServiceInstaller Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ServiceInstaller Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ServiceInstaller Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount LocalService = int32(0)

summary.span: 充当本地计算机上非特权用户的帐户，该帐户将匿名凭据提供给所有远程服务器。

span.span: An account that acts as a non-privileged user on the local computer, and presents anonymous credentials to any remote server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount LocalSystem = int32(2)

summary.span: 服务控制管理员使用的帐户，它具有本地计算机上的许多权限并作为网络上的计算机。

span.span: An account, used by the service control manager, that has extensive privileges on the local computer and acts as the computer on the network.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount NetworkService = int32(1)

summary.span: 提供广泛的本地特权的帐户，该帐户将计算机的凭据提供给所有远程服务器。

span.span: An account that provides extensive local privileges, and presents the computer's credentials to any remote server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount User = int32(3)

summary.span: 由网络上特定的用户定义的帐户。

span.span: An account defined by a specific user on the network.

summary.span: 如果为 成员指定 ，则会使系统在安装服务时提示输入有效的用户名和密码，除非您为 实例的 和 这两个属性设置值。

span.span: Specifying for the member causes the system to prompt for a valid user name and password when the service is installed, unless you set values for both the and properties of your instance.
